org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver
Enum ServerType

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<ServerType>
      org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver.ServerType
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<ServerType>
public enum ServerType
extends Enum<ServerType>

Defines the type of server, UDP or TCP. Determines which ServerEndpoint is being used. The server behaves exactly the same in both modes, except the message transport types are being switched (without breaking API). In UDP mode, TCP mode is being emulated (see ServerEndpoint for more info on this).

Since:
1.0
Author:
Benny Bottema

createServerEndpoint

abstract ServerEndpoint createServerEndpoint(int port)
                                      throws SocketException,
                                             IOException
Creates a server endpoint embedding a transport type specific socket (UDP or TCP).

Parameters:
port - The port on which the server endpoint socket should list.
Returns:
A UDP or TCP ServerEndpoint.
Throws:
SocketException - Thrown when creating an UDP DatagramSocket went wrong.
IOException - Thrown when creating a TCP ServerSocket went wrong.
